attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: revert to 17.5 % vat with immediate effect saving 8 Billion it clearly has not worked.Another tried and failed.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please remove your name from the title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
